design.layout: full-width hero with sticky header and feature cards footer

typography.headingStyle: Bold sans-serif, large scale (80px+), white text with strong contrast, multi-line layout
typography.bodyStyle: Medium-weight sans-serif, white/light gray text on dark backgrounds, readable at all sizes
typography.dataStyle: Large numeric values (2,347, 1,000%+, 0%, #1) in white with context labels below in smaller gray text

components.description: Horizontal sticky header with logo, dropdown menus (Exchange, DEX+, Buy Crypto, Markets, Spot, Futures GOLD badge, Earn, Event Center, More), search, auth buttons
components.notable: GOLD badge on Futures menu item; blue Sign Up button stands out; promotional 'Commodity Zero-Fee Gala' text

components.description: Centered text with animated 3D assets (gold bars, silver bars, large zero percent symbol) on dark background with subtle vertical line pattern
components.notable: Cinematic 3D rendering with dramatic lighting; metallic gold/silver visual metaphor for commodities

components.description: Email/Mobile Number input field with blue Sign Up button and social login icons (Google, Apple, Telegram)
components.notable: Inline form with multi-sign-up options; prominent CTA button

components.description: Four dark cards with white headings, large KPI numbers, and right-arrow navigation
components.notable: Metric-driven storytelling: trending tokens, APR, fees, liquidity rankings

design.visualHierarchy: Large hero headline dominates upper half; animated 3D asset draws eye; sign-up form positioned as secondary CTA; footer cards present supporting metrics
innovativeElements: 3D animated metallic objects (gold/silver bars and percent symbol) with depth and lighting effects
Dark background with subtle vertical line pattern suggesting market volatility
GOLD badge on Futures navigation indicating premium tier

flow.userIntent: Discover MEXC platform capabilities, particularly Gold & Silver Futures trading, and sign up for account
entryPoints: Marketing campaign or external link featuring 0 Fees promotion
exitPoints: Navigation menu items (Exchange, DEX+, Markets, Futures, Earn)
Feature card navigation (Most Trending Tokens, Everyday Airdrops, Xtremely Low Fees, Comprehensive Liquidity)

interactiveElements.action: Opens registration flow with email/mobile entry
Accepts user contact information for signup
Authenticates via Google, Apple, or Telegram
Navigate to detailed product pages (right arrow indicates clickability)

flow.informationArchitecture: Top-level: Navigation by product type (trading venues, education, events); Primary focus: Futures trading promotion with conversion incentive; Secondary focus: Supporting metrics and benefits; Tertiary: Account management and search
frictionPoints: Multiple navigation options may overwhelm new users
Large number of dropdown menus could increase decision paralysis
3D hero asset may not load reliably on slower connections
